content: Yeah, I also made some coleslaw on the side, which my sister brought, and it paired really well with the smoky flavor of the chicken. As for the grilling technique, I used a combination of direct and indirect heat to get those nice grill marks. I grilled the chicken breasts over direct heat for about 5-7 minutes per side to get the sear, and then finished them off over indirect heat to cook them through. It worked out perfectly!
